title: The Porsche Design Font
content:
Hi, does everybody know the Porsche Design font?

[http://www.eu-design.net/edf/forum\_page.php?&workshop=5&intervento=48&pa...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140727051022/http:/www.eu-design.net/edf/forum_page.php?&workshop=5&intervento=48&pagina=2# "http://www.eu-design.net/edf/forum\_page.php?&workshop=5&intervento=48&pagina=2#")

[http://www.porsche-design.com/live//Home.PorscheDesign?flash=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20140727051022/http:/www.porsche-design.com/live/Home.PorscheDesign?flash=0 "http://www.porsche-design.com/live//Home.PorscheDesign?flash=0")

I'm looking for something similar (square or extended, technical looking, but still very readable) and I remember being on a website that had loads of good ones like this a while ago, but I can't find it again (probably directed there the first time round from Pixelsurgeon if that helps). Any font and/or website suggestions?

Thanks in advance.
author: BenjaminKnight

comments.content: Try looking for "911 Porscha font" or "911 Porsche font".

Hi, doesn't have to be the actual font they use; the first link shows you that it was bespoke. That was just an example of the kind of thing I want - the best example I've seen. I'm looking for something so good it could be that one, but it's not.

Anyone know any websites with loads of technical looking fonts?

Thanks.
